heading: Antiraid Settings
explanation: The antiraid system monitors the influx rate of users to your guild depending on the specified values below. If the rate exceeds the parameters, the guilds verification level is set to highest and all new members joining after that are recorded in the list below. Also, all admins of the guild will be notified about the event via DM.

regeneration.label: Regeneration Duration
regeneration.explanation: The estimated usual time between two users joining your guild.

burst.label: Burst Amount
burst.explanation: The amount of users who shold be able to join in a short period of time without triggering the antiraid system.

verification.label: User Verification
verification.explanation: Automatically enables the requirement of account verification for ner members joining the guild.

log.empty: No one is on this list at the moment. ðŸ‘»
